Team Data Alliance
Dream 11 Fantasy Team Suggestions and Statistical Analysis
Predicting player performance and providing statistical analysis of matches

Know more

About Dream11

Dream 11 is a fantasy betting application where users place their bets by selecting a team of 11 players. Users analyze the statistics of players in the current match and form a team which would make them win in Dream 11 contests.

We provide statistical analysis of the players by considering most of the features such as average runs earned, waggon weel, partnershipsand

Analysis on Data

Dismissal Analysis

The dismissal of the players adds points, the analysis of the dismissal helps in selecting best bowlers to the team.

In fantasy betting, the points for dismissal differ with the type of dismissal. So it is necessary to analyze the dismissal types.

Highest run scorer analysis

Analyzing the performance of the highest scorers help in picking the best batsmen to the team.

Best Performer Analysis

The player of the match analysis helps in deciding player's priority over others in the team for the next match.

Partnership Analysis

Best player partnership can score high runs in a match. By analyzing the player partnerships, we can choose players accordingly.

Pairplot Analysis

Pair plot is used to understand the best set of features to explain a relationship between two variables or to form the most separated clusters. Therefore, analysing the pairplots helps us to find the development of the team in various factors. The diagonal plots are treated differently: a univariate distribution plot is drawn to show the marginal distribution of the data in each column. It is also possible to show a subset of variables or plot different variables on the rows and columns.

Team Wicket Analysis

It shows the distribution of quantitative data across several levels of one (or more) categorical variables such that those distributions can be compared Unlike a box plot, in which all of the plot components correspond to actual datapoints, the violin plot features a kernel density estimation of the underlying distribution

Functionalities Provided

Batsmen performance prediction

Using machine learning techniques such as Random Forest, Xg Boost, SVM we are predicting the performance of the player in the upcoming match. The features that are used for the prediction are player statistics, venue, opposition team.

Bowler performance prediction

The bowler performance is predicted using several machine learning algorithms with the help of the inputs such as opposition team and venue.
